description:
Google kicked off its annual I/O developer conference with a clear emphasis on AI, unveiling a suite of new Gemini-powered solutions to empower developers. At the forefront is an expansion of Google’s Gemini language model, including the public preview of 1.5 Flash which is designed for high-frequency tasks. Developers can join a waitlist to preview... Read more »

The post Google continues AI push with new Gemini tools for developers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Google continues AI push with new Gemini tools for developers
